channel.title: [TUT] Making a basic auto-talker
channel.description:
First of all you need to create a basic form. Then make a log textbox and a short text box. Then make 2 command buttons and a timer. [IMG]http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y118/thechezman14/Basicauto-talker1.jpg[/img] Dont worry you wont me able to see the timer when it compiles. Right click somewhere and go to veiw code. copy and paste [CODE]' /////////////////////////////////////// ' // Basic Auto-Talker // ' // Coding By Chezy // ' // Contact thechezman14@hotmail.com // '///////////////////////////////////////
Private Sub Command1_Click()
'Sets the time on the auto-talker Timer1.Interval = Text2.Text * 1000
'Turns on the timer Timer1.Enabled = True
End Sub
Private Sub Command2_Click()
'Turns off the timer Timer1.Enabled = False
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()
'Changes the tital to "Basic Auto-Talker Me.Caption = "Basic Auto-Talker"
'Makes so the auto-talker doesnt strat automaticly Timer1.Enabled = False
'Changes the text in the first textbox to "Your Message Here" Text1.Text = "You Message Here"
'Changes the text in the second textbox to "7" Text2.Text = "7"
'Changes the name on the first command button to "Start" Command1.Caption = "&Start"
'Changes the name on the second command button to "Stop" Command2.Caption = "S&top"
End Sub
Private Sub Timer1_Timer()
'Type's whatever's in the first textbox SendKeys Text1.Text
'Works like pressing enter on the keyboard SendKeys "{enter}"
End Sub[/CODE] into the code

item.title: [TUT] Making a basic auto-talker
item.dc:creator: @thechezman14 thechezman14
item.description:
@thechezman14 wrote:

First of all you need to create a basic form.
Then make a log textbox and a short text box.
Then make 2 command buttons and a timer.
[IMG]http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y118/thechezman14/Basicauto-talker1.jpg[/img]
Dont worry you wont me able to see the timer when it compiles.
Right click somewhere and go to veiw code.
copy and paste 

'    ///////////////////////////////////////
'   //         Basic Auto-Talker         //
'  //          Coding By Chezy          //
' // Contact thechezman14@hotmail.com  //
'///////////////////////////////////////
Private Sub Command1_Click()
'Sets the time on the auto-talker
Timer1.Interval = Text2.Text * 1000
'Turns on the timer
Timer1.Enabled = True
End Sub
Private Sub Command2_Click()
'Turns off the timer
Timer1.Enabled = False
End Sub
Private Sub Form_Load()
'Changes the tital to "Basic Auto-Talker
Me.Caption = "Basic Auto-Talker"
'Makes so the auto-talker doesnt strat automaticly
Timer1.Enabled = False
'Changes the text in the first textbox to "Your Message Here"
Text1.Text = "You Message Here"
'Changes the text in the second textbox to "7"
Text2.Text = "7"
'Changes the name on the first command button to "Start"
Command1.Caption = "&Start"
'Changes the name on the second command button to "Stop"
Command2.Caption = "S&top"
End Sub
Private Sub Timer1_Timer()
'Type's whatever's in the first textbox
SendKeys Text1.Text
'Works like pressing enter on the keyboard
SendKeys "{enter}"
End Sub

into the code

Read full topic
